programming & technical skills.title: Symfony developer
programming & technical skills.subtitle: Bitonda S.A.S., Turin
programming & technical skills.description: I developed the backend of the ScontriNO software, a system that allows the automatic collection of medical receipts. Thanks to this record of receipts, the user is able to use them for fiscal deduction. I developed inside the Symfony framework, and my focus was on the development of several plugins for the automatic generation of PDF files.

programming & technical skills.title: Technical department's stagist
programming & technical skills.subtitle: ASL TO3, Pinerolo (TO)
programming & technical skills.description: Management of the ASL staff's credentials and in-place technical interventions. I also provided assistance to the HelpDesk.
